text: Kamen Rider Zi-O is a Japanese tokusatsu drama in the Kamen Rider franchise. ==Schedule== Super Hero Time joining Kaitou Sentai Lupinranger VS Keisatsu Sentai Patranger and later, the miniseries Super Sentai Strongest Battle aired alongside Kishiryu Sentai Ryusoulger. ==Cast== * Sougo Tokiwa / Kamen Rider Zi-O: So Okuno * Geiz Myokoin / Kamen Rider Geiz: Gaku Oshida * Tsukuyomi / Kamen Rider Tsukuyomi: Shieri Ohata * Woz / Kamen Rider Woz: Keisuke Watanabe * Heure: Rihito Itagaki * Ora: Ayaka Konno * Swartz: Kentarou Kanesaki * Junichirō Tokiwa: Katsuhisa Namase * Tsukasa Kadoya / Kamen Rider Decade: Masahiro Inoue * Daiki Kaito / Kamen Rider Diend: Kimito Totani * Hiryū Kakogawa: Yu Sakuma * Opening Narration, Ohma Zi-O (Voice): Rikiya Koyama * Ziku-Driver Equipment Voice: Rikiya Koyama, Yohei Onishi * BeyonDriver Equipment Voice: Afro * Neo DecaDriver Voice, Neo DienDriver Voice: Mark Okita * Narration: Naohiko Fujino ===Guest cast=== * Resistance captain (1): Kazutoshi Yokoyama * Sento Kiryu / Kamen Rider Build (1, 2): Atsuhiro Inukai * Ryuga Banjo / Kamen Rider Cross-Z (1, 2): Eiji Akaso * Emu Hojo / Kamen Rider Ex-Aid (3, 4): Hiroki Ijima * Hiiro Kagami / Kamen World: Ryota Murai ; Kamen Rider Zi-O vs Decade cast * Misa Kuon: Rena Takeda ==Theme songs== ; Opening theme * "Over "Quaztzer"" ** Lyrics: Shuta Sueyoshi, Takaki Mizoguchi ** Composition: MiNE, Atsushi Shimada ** Arrangement: Atsushi Shimada ** Artist: Shuta Sueyoshi feat. ISSA ; Insert themes * "Zi-O Toki no Ōja" ("Zi-O the King of Time") ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: Toshihiko Sahashi ** Artist: Sougo Tokiwa (So Okuno) ** Episodes: 16, 22 * "FUTURE GUARDIAN" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: Toshihiko Sahashi ** Artist: Geiz Myokoin (Gaku Oshida) ** Episodes: 19 * "Black & White" ** Lyrics: Megane Hirai ** Composition & Arrangement: Go Sakabe ** Artist: Woz (Keisuke Watanabe) ** Episodes: 38 * "Next New Wφrld" ** Lyrics: Ricky ** Composition & Arrangement: nishi-ken ** Artist: Rider Chips ** Episodes: 40 * "IZANAGI" ** Performed by: Sakuramen feat. Hideya Tawada * "INSIDE-OUT Zi-O ver." ** Performed by: Sougo Tokiwa (So Okuno) & Tsukasa Kadoya (Masahiro Inoue) * "INSIDE-OUT Decade ver." ** Performed by: Tsukasa Kadoya (Masahiro Inoue) & Sougo Tokiwa (So Okuno) Category:Japanese science fiction television series Category:2018 television series debuts Category:2019 Japanese television series endings
